title: 1.5 Master Challenge 1
question: Given below is a Python program to print even numbers up to 100. However, due to some logical error, it goes into an infinite loop. Fix the program.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
